## Species information

Species information fields, e.g., for the [EAR report](https://github.com/ERGA-consortium/EARs)

```{python}
#| output: asis
if tax_id:
    print("<b>Taxid:</b>")
    print(f"{tax_id}")
```

```{python}
#| output: asis
if "busco" in multiqc.list_modules() and glob.glob(f"{log_path}/short_summary*txt"):
    lineages = []
    for lineage in multiqc.list_plots()["busco"]:
        cleaned_lineage = lineage.replace("Lineage: ", "")
        lineages.append(cleaned_lineage)
    print("<b>BUSCO lineages:</b>")
    print(",".join(lineages))
```
